version_description:
- New: Auto search for sender’s public PGP key
- Fix: SMTP may not validate for certain providers
- Various stability fixes

- New: Push notifications
- New: Clearer unread indicator
- New: Option to select PGP key per account
- Fix: PGP passphrase input may not be accessible on smaller screens
- Fix: PGP keys may not delete correctly
- Fix: Display warning in ca

- All new iPad app
- New: Landscape mode for iPhone
- New: 2 column view for iPhone 7 Plus in landscape
- New: Option to require TouchID on app launch
- New: Today Widget
- Fix: PGP encrypt/decrypt errors
- Fix: No push notification soun

- New: Status bar should indicate offline status if applicable
- Fix: Emails read on other devices may still appear as unread when app is launched
- Fix: Toggling ‘Sign by Default’ preference could cause a crash
- Fix: App could crash when encryp

- New: Option to disable conversations
- Fix: Validate popups shouldn’t be shown multiple times if login succeeds
- Fix: App may not connect correctly on launch / wake from sleep
- Fix: PGP decryption may not work for Symantec Encryption Desktop<
Improvements for push notifications

- New: Seamless automatic end-to-end encryption when sending emails to other Canary users
- Fix: Sending may not work for Outlook accounts in some situations
- Fix: Email(s) shouldn’t be sent multiple times
- Fix: Starred emails may not appear in

- New: Handoff support - now you can open an email on iPhone and continue reading it on your Mac and vice versa (must have Handoff enabled on both devices)
- New: Aliases
- New: Ability to share emails
- New: Option to lock app using passcode

- New: Trello / Kanban style To-Do and Follow-Up boards (accessible via Activity icon)
- New: Email follow-up reminders
- New: Cross-account Move
- New: Support for inline PGP messages
- New: Option to limit connections to prevent hitting serv

- New: UI updates for iPhone X
- New: Trello / Kanban style To-Do and Follow-Up boards (accessible via Activity icon)
- New: Email follow-up reminders
- New: Support for inline PGP messages
- New: Option to limit connections to prevent hitting

- New: Dynamic Type support
- New: Ability to add/delete/rename folders
- New: Auto-generated public PGP keys are now searchable via Key Manager
- Fix: PDF attachments use new PDFKit for display for iOS11
- Fix: Improved non-blocking account v

**Special Intro Offer: Try Canary FREE for 3 days**

Canary is a paid app. One-time fee after 3 day trial: $4.99 USD.

*Prices may vary by territory*.

- Fix: IDLE may not work correctly for non-gmail accounts
- Fix: Crash on resuming

- New: Left/Right Align for compose
- New: Ability to move emails to other accounts
- Fix: No more password popups. Status bar prompts when there are connection errors
- Fix: IDLE may not work correctly for non-gmail accounts
- Fix: Crash on r

- New: Stronger local database encryption
- New: Allow loading PGP keyrings with invalid packets
- New: Notifications show bolded subject subtitles
- Fix: Improve app responsiveness
- Fix: Database corruption in certain situations
- Fix: Re

• New: Security & Privacy section in Prefs

**[Version] 2.06 (418)**
• New: Passcodes can now be alpha-numeric
• New: Ability to disable biometrics when using passcodes
• New: Elgamal support for PGP
• New: Ability to delete saved PGP key passphrases
• Fix: Importing certain PGP keys
Stability and bug fixes
Various bug and stability fixes
Stability and bug fixes
Canary is now faster and easier to use!
Canary is now even faster and easier to use!

- New: Support for encrypted (.asc) file attachments
- New: Support for more PGP key file formats
- New: Support for loading keyrings while ignoring unsupported keys
- New: Catalan language support

- Fix: Accounts with 1000+ labels/folders may not work correctly
- Fix: PGP signed messages may not be recognized properly
- Fix: Editing drafts may not display correctly in compose
- Various stability and performance fixes

• Fix: Email dates may be incorrect for certain Exchange accounts
• Fix: Setting default signature for accounts may not save correctly
• Fix: Forwarding an email may not display sender email address in the email body

This update brings improved search functionality and faster email fetching & rendering.
This update brings improved search and faster email sync for Gmail, iCloud, Office365 & Exchange.
This version brings significant rendering speed improvements
This version makes Canary more stable and more energy efficient
This version makes Canary more energy efficient & improves core stability.
